'Removes a package from the require or require-dev.'
'Removes a package from the require-dev section.'
'Disables the automatic update of the dependencies.'
'Skips the execution of all scripts defined in composer.json file.'
'Run the dependency update with the --no-dev option.'
'Allows inherited dependencies to be updated with explicit dependencies. (Deprecrated, is now default behavior)'
'Does not allow inherited dependencies to be updated with explicit dependencies.'
'Autoload classes from the classmap only. Implicitly enables `--optimize-autoloader`.'
The <info>remove</info> command removes a package from the current

'<warning>You are using the deprecated option "update-with-dependencies". This is now default behaviour. The --no-update-with-dependencies option can be used to remove a package without its dependencies.</warning>'
// make sure name checks are done case insensitively
'Do you want to remove it from '
'Do you want to remove it from '
' is not required in your composer.json and has not been removed</warning>'
